title: Flame
description: The discovery of a dragon's egg in the forest brings about great changes in the school life of Molly. Given the task of keeping the dragon safe and a secret is a huge ask for a teenage girl. Eventually one of the students discover's Molly's secret.Will she be helpful or will she expose Molly and the Academy for not destroying a dragon?Girls aged 9-12 will love Book 5 of this series.
author: Katrina Kahler
